mission_name: BlockchainUnmasked.com Audit & Contact Center Research Integration
mission_description: Comprehensive research mission to audit blockchainunmasked.com website (focusing on client onboarding and crypto theft reporting processes) and research enterprise contact center workflows for integration into AI agent demo app with enhanced quality assurance, agent tiers, and stealth mode capabilities

mission_objectives.objective_description: Comprehensive audit of blockchainunmasked.com website with focus on client onboarding processes, crypto theft reporting workflows, and content preservation for historical reference
mission_objectives.success_criteria: Complete website audit with screenshots, content backup, and process documentation

mission_objectives.objective_description: Research enterprise contact center workflows, agent tier systems, quality assurance processes, and knowledge base architectures for integration into AI agent demo
mission_objectives.success_criteria: Comprehensive research document covering contact center best practices and workflows

mission_objectives.objective_description: Design enhanced AI agent system with contact center workflows, agent tiers, quality assurance, and stealth mode capabilities
mission_objectives.success_criteria: Complete app enhancement design with implementation plan

mission_objectives.objective_description: Integrate contact center research findings into MCP servers with proper access controls and agent tier knowledge management
mission_objectives.success_criteria: Enhanced MCP servers with contact center workflows and agent tier system

mission_objectives.objective_description: Generate comprehensive Super Auto Prompt (SAP) in full key field JSON format for research agent handoff
mission_objectives.success_criteria: Complete SAP document ready for research agent execution

phases.phase_description: Plan research approach, set up tools, and establish research framework

tasks.task_description: Establish research methodology and framework for both website audit and contact center research
Assign appropriate tool loadouts for web scraping, research, and development tasks
Plan detailed timeline for research phases and deliverables

phases.phase_description: Execute comprehensive audit of blockchainunmasked.com website

tasks.task_description: Crawl and map entire website structure, identify all pages and navigation flows
Deep dive into client onboarding processes, forms, and workflows
Analyze crypto theft reporting processes, forms, and victim support workflows
Create comprehensive backup of all website content, screenshots, and process documentation

phases.phase_description: Research enterprise contact center workflows and best practices

tasks.task_description: Research agent tier systems, escalation workflows, and knowledge access levels
Research QA processes, monitoring systems, and agent performance metrics
Research knowledge base systems, content management, and agent training workflows
Research how contact centers integrate AI, automation, and human agents

phases.phase_description: Design enhanced AI agent system with contact center workflows

tasks.task_description: Design agent tier system with appropriate knowledge access and capabilities
Design QA system with triggers between canned responses, AI, and human agents
Design stealth mode vs. transparent mode for agent identification
Implement enhanced features in app folder with proper integration

phases.phase_description: Enhance MCP servers with contact center workflows and agent tier system

tasks.task_description: Enhance lab MCP server with contact center research capabilities
Enhance app MCP server with agent tier system and workflows

phases.phase_description: Generate comprehensive Super Auto Prompt for research agent handoff

tasks.task_description: Compile all research findings into comprehensive requirements document
Generate full key field JSON SAP document for research agent

resource_requirements: Lab MCP servers with full system access

milestones.description: Complete blockchainunmasked.com audit with content backup
Enhanced AI agent system with contact center workflows
Enhanced MCP servers with contact center capabilities
Complete SAP document for research agent handoff

security_requirements: Access boundaries enforced for different agent tiers
Knowledge access controls based on agent level
Secure handling of sensitive client information
Proper isolation between lab and app environments

identified_risks.risk_description: blockchainunmasked.com may have access restrictions or anti-scraping measures
identified_risks.mitigation_strategy: Use multiple scraping approaches and manual review if needed

identified_risks.risk_description: Contact center research may expand beyond initial scope
identified_risks.mitigation_strategy: Strict scope management and milestone tracking

identified_risks.risk_description: Integration of contact center workflows may be more complex than anticipated

deliverables.deliverable_description: Comprehensive audit of blockchainunmasked.com with focus on client onboarding and crypto theft reporting
Research findings on enterprise contact center workflows, agent tiers, and QA processes
Enhanced AI agent demo with contact center workflows, agent tiers, and stealth mode
Enhanced MCP servers with contact center capabilities and agent tier system
Complete Super Auto Prompt document in full key field JSON format for research agent
